data.text: @JennyNimon Boo to that! Take care, the two young people I know who’ve had it were quite sick for a week so don’t push yourself! Xx
@jaxies Yeah, I’m pretty gutted not to be able to come to class in person, but it is what it is. Looking forward to catching up when I’m all better and out of iso!
@JennyNimon Oh man! Take care Jenny, I hope you have a speedy recovery:)
@JennyNimon Sad I still won’t get to see you this coming Weds but there will be more days ahead! Rest, rest, rest x
@jaxies Yes, exactly. Trying to look on the bright side!
@JennyNimon Oh Jenny! Rest up and feel better soon. Lots of time to sleep, read and write ❤️
@CravenJaney Yep. Just had a super mild scratchy throat and was erring on the side of caution. I tested negative on Friday. Since then it has developed into a slight cough and runny nose.
I also have no clue where I contracted it. I’m not a contact of anyone. Remember to mask up and sanitise when you’re out and about.

In all seriousness though, I’m fine. I was only just boosted three weeks ago, so I’m at peak immunity. For me it feels more mild than most colds, but I know it’s hitting lots of people hard. Moral of the story: get boosted.
